entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: pratikyelwande/SEIM: A lightweight SIEM system built with Express.js and React.js. It collects logs, performs port scans, and displays real-time security data on a dashboard. Designed to simplify network monitoring and threat detection, enabling quick responses to vulnerabilities.
entry.content: A lightweight SIEM system built with Express.js and React.js. It collects logs, performs port scans, and displays real-time security data on a dashboard. Designed to simplify network monitoring and threat detection, enabling quick responses to vulnerabilities.
